title: “Deeply disturbing”: Candace Owens backs must read opinion post on Erika Kirk’s behavior after Charlie Kirk’s passing
summary_full: Candace Owens publicly supported a critical opinion post about Erika Kirk written by journalist Elizabeth Lane. Lane claimed she feels uncomfortable watching Erika Kirk and questioned her public behavior, calling it performative. She stressed her comments were personal opinions, not facts. Owens endorsed the message on X, increasing online debate. Erika Kirk has not responded publicly.
